# Neptune Station Server Rules
This server is designed to let you be and do whoever and whatever you want! Follow this basic set of rules and whether or not you're a 'normal' player everyone should be able to have fun!
## SERVER RULES
1. Standard Of Roleplay:, Spawning as King Von and killing everybody is funny, but not the vibe this server is going for. A standard of roleplay is enforced to where you have to act like you somewhat arnt playing a video game.
2. No IRL Bigotry, You can be specist, but no getting weird with it. No calling people the n word or any real life slurs.
3. No metagaming, powergaming, or any of the sort., Everyone is trying to have fun here, ruining the game for other people isnt cool.
4. No ERP,
There could be minors here, light dating is allowed but only if you know the other person is 18.
5. No station wide destruction after 20 minutes,
People are trying to have fun, the entire station getting destroyed 1 minute into the round isnt fun.
